description:
Gyarodos is a Pokémon that Fergus took to New Island after Fergus was invited to meet the "World`s Greatest Pokémon Trainer".
Fergus attempted to defeat Mewtwo by having his Gyarados attack it using Hyper Beam.
Mewtwo captured Gyarados and made a clone of it for himself.
name: Gyarados (Umio)
